lines.text: The communists have ideas. But they found out you can't run a government with everybody going around having ideas. So what is happening, the communists are being executed so that Communism should succeed.
You can't have a revolution in a country where the people love hot dogs and boogie-woogie.
What, uh, what are they singing?
"We are Free."
I, uh, I got a confession to make. I lied to you.
What about?
The USA. It ain't a spiritual desert. Say, it's pie a la mode, two-pants suits and the home of the brave, Pike's Peak and Coney Island.
You're just like all the other Russians I know. They're hanging upside down from chandeliers throwing rocks at each other and for a penny they'll set fire to their pants.
The never never land of steppes, samovars, and spies - beards, bears, bombs, and borscht - where anything can happen - and usually does - almost.
Probably the government's decided that from now on all foreign correspondents must be blindfolded and lead around by seeing-eye dogs.
Ha-ha-ha.
'Anything to keep the truth out' is their motto.
Please, Miss Wilson, do not speak for me. I am not complaining against the Russian government.
My dear Van Hofer, a German journalist is not in the position of complaining against the absence of truth anywhere.
Quite you are, Miss!

[Offended]
Excuse me!
With pleasure, old boy.
Excuse me, Mr. Thompson, how soon can I talk to you alone?
You'll have to wait until we're alone, Vanya.
Why did you do this to me, Mac?
Why does a man lie to a woman?... because he loves her.
You can trust me, Mac. I won't let on to the bride what a rat you are. That she must find out for herself!

[to Mac]
You are the first American I have ever met with a soul. It has a strange effect on me.
[They kiss]

[Yawning in prison]
Oh, I'd like to get some sleep before I die.

[referring to Vanya]
If he's Comrade X, I'll eat the kremlin without sauce!
Ever hear of the Brooklyn Dodgers?
No.
They get murdered every day.
Murdered? What for?
For making some little errors.
There must be a revolution soon in America.
No, you can't have a revolution with people who believe in hot dogs and boogie woogie.
Well, there's some good news and some bad news. Last week all the towels were stolen. But on the other hand the water wasn't running so nobody needed the towels. Everything balances.
Hello, honeybun. Miss me?
No, I can always go to the zoo when you're away.
Oh, I've got rivals, huh?

[describing the crew of the Russian tank]
Pilot, co-pilot, co-copilot, co-co-co-pilot.

[Referring to the assassination of his predecessor]
How quickly fortune changes when we help it a little!

[Sarcastically to Theodore and her father]
You know, it's gonna be kinda tough to surrender to these people. You got to catch 'em first.
Yes? What's that? Germany has what? Tanks, huh? When? I see. Thanks.
Germany has just declared war on Russia! Ten tank division just moved into the Ukraine!
[This event actually happened seven months later]
